attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is in the best interests of this country that relations between Great Britain and Zimbabwe to be strong, as a means of turning Zimbabwe into a free, peaceful nation. And what better way than for Blair and Mugabe to be so close. Of course, there might be a problem, as Prince Charles has already legally married Mugabe (I'm dreadfully sorry Camilla).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
